verses.text: Moreover \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, Let me now choose \w out|strong="H0977"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, and I will \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* and \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* this \w night|strong="H3915"\w*:

And I will \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon him while he \add is\add* \w weary|strong="H3023"\w* and \w weak|strong="H7504"\w* \w handed|strong="H3027"\w*, and will make him \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*: and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add are\add* with him shall \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*; and I will \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* only:

And I will bring \w back|strong="H7725"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto thee: the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whom thou \w seekest|strong="H1245"\w* \add is\add* as if all \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*: \add so\add* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall be in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

And the \w saying|strong="H1697"\w* \w pleased|strong="H3474"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w well|strong="H5869"\w*, and all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 17.4 \ft pleased…: Heb. was right in the eyes of, etc\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* now \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* the \w Archite|strong="H0757"\w* also, and let us \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* likewise what he \w saith|strong="H6310"\w*.\f + \fr 17.5 \ft what…: Heb. what is in his mouth\f*

And when \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* after this \w manner|strong="H1697"\w*: shall we \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add after\add* his \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*? if not; \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* thou.\f + \fr 17.6 \ft his saying: Heb. his word\f*

And \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, The \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* that \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w* hath \w given|strong="H3289"\w* \add is\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w* at this \w time|strong="H6471"\w*.\f + \fr 17.7 \ft given: Heb. counselled\f*

For, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w*, thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, that they \add be\add* mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, and they \add be\add* \w chafed|strong="H4751"\w* in their \w minds|strong="H5315"\w*, as a \w bear|strong="H1677"\w* \w robbed|strong="H7909"\w* of her whelps in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*: and thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \add is\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, and will not \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w* with the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 17.8 \ft chafed…: Heb. bitter of soul\f*

Behold, he is \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* now in \w some|strong="H0259"\w* \w pit|strong="H6354"\w*, or in \w some|strong="H0259"\w* \add other\add* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: and it will come to pass, when some of them be \w overthrown|strong="H5307"\w* at the \w first|strong="H8462"\w*, that \w whosoever|strong="H8085"\w* \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* it will \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, There is a \w slaughter|strong="H4046"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*.\f + \fr 17.9 \ft overthrown: Heb. fallen\f*

And he also \add that is\add* \w valiant|strong="H1121"\w*, whose \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add is\add* as the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, shall \w utterly|strong="H4549"\w* \w melt|strong="H4549"\w*: for all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* that thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \add is\add* a mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w*, and \add they\add* which \add be\add* with him \add are\add* \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*.

Therefore I \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* that all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* be \w generally|strong="H0622"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* unto thee, from \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* even to \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w*, as the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* that \add is\add* by the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* for \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w*; and that thou \w go|strong="H1980"\w* to \w battle|strong="H7128"\w* in thine own \w person|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 17.11 \ft that thou…: Heb. that thy face, or, presence go, etc\f*

So shall we \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon him in \w some|strong="H0259"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where he shall be \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, and we will \w light|strong="H5168"\w* upon him as the \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* \w falleth|strong="H5307"\w* on the \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*: and of him and of all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \add are\add* with him there shall not be \w left|strong="H3498"\w* so much \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*.

Moreover, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* he be \w gotten|strong="H0622"\w* into a \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, then shall all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H5375"\w* \w ropes|strong="H2256"\w* to that \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and we will \w draw|strong="H5498"\w* it into the \w river|strong="H5158"\w*, until there be not \w one|strong="H1571"\w* small \w stone|strong="H6872"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* there.

And \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* and all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* the \w Archite|strong="H0757"\w* \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w*. For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w appointed|strong="H6680"\w* to \w defeat|strong="H6565"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w*, to the \w intent|strong="H5668"\w* that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* might \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*.  +  r 17.14  t appointed: Heb. commanded *

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* unto \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* and to \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, Thus and thus did \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w* \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and thus and thus have I \w counselled|strong="H3289"\w*.

Now therefore \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w*, and \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Lodge|strong="H3885"\w* not this \w night|strong="H3915"\w* in the \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, but \w speedily|strong="H5674"\w* pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w*; lest the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* be swallowed \w up|strong="H1104"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add are\add* with him.

Now \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* and \w Ahimaaz|strong="H0290"\w* \w stayed|strong="H5975"\w* by \w En-rogel|strong="H5883"\w*; for they \w might|strong="H3201"\w* not be \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: and a \w wench|strong="H8198"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* them; and they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

Nevertheless a \w lad|strong="H5288"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* them, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*: but they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them away \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to a \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in \w Bahurim|strong="H0980"\w*, which had a \w well|strong="H0875"\w* in his \w court|strong="H2691"\w*; \w whither|strong="H8033"\w* they went \w down|strong="H3381"\w*.

And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* and \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* a \w covering|strong="H4539"\w* over the \w well’s|strong="H0875"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w spread|strong="H7849"\w* ground \w corn|strong="H7383"\w* thereon; and the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* was not \w known|strong="H3045"\w*.

And when \w Absalom’s|strong="H0053"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Where \add is\add* \w Ahimaaz|strong="H0290"\w* and \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*? And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, They be gone \w over|strong="H5674"\w* the \w brook|strong="H4323"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. And when they had \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* and could not \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \add them\add*, they \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And it came to pass, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* they were \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*, that they came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w well|strong="H0875"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, and pass \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: for thus hath \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w* \w counselled|strong="H3289"\w* against you.

Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him, and they passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*: by the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* there \w lacked|strong="H5737"\w* not \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of them that was not gone \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

¶ And when \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that his \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* was not \w followed|strong="H6213"\w*, he \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w* \add his\add* \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, and \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and gat him \w home|strong="H3212"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, to his \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and put his \w household|strong="H1004"\w* in \w order|strong="H6680"\w*, and \w hanged|strong="H2614"\w* himself, and \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in the \w sepulchre|strong="H6913"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 17.23 \ft followed: Heb. done\f*\f + \fr 17.23 \ft put his…: Heb. gave charge concerning his house\f*

Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Mahanaim|strong="H4266"\w*. And \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, he and all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him.

¶ And \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* captain of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* instead of \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*: which \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \add was\add* a \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Ithra|strong="H3501"\w* an \w Israelite|strong="H3481"\w*, that went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Nahash|strong="H5176"\w*, \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* to \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w* \w Joab’s|strong="H3097"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.\f + \fr 17.25 \ft Ithra an Israelite: or, Jether an Ishmaelite\f*\f + \fr 17.25 \ft Abigail: Heb. Abigal\f*\f + \fr 17.25 \ft Nahash: or, Jesse\f*
So \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Mahanaim|strong="H4266"\w*, that \w Shobi|strong="H7629"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nahash|strong="H5176"\w* of \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammiel|strong="H5988"\w* of \w Lo-debar|strong="H3810"\w*, and \w Barzillai|strong="H1271"\w* the \w Gileadite|strong="H1569"\w* of \w Rogelim|strong="H7274"\w*,

\w Brought|strong="H5066"\w* \w beds|strong="H4904"\w*, and \w basons|strong="H5592"\w*, and \w earthen|strong="H3335"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*, and \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, and \w flour|strong="H7058"\w*, and \w parched|strong="H7039"\w* \add corn\add*, and \w beans|strong="H6321"\w*, and \w lentiles|strong="H5742"\w*, and \w parched|strong="H7039"\w* \add pulse\add*,\f + \fr 17.28 \ft basons: or, cups\f*

And \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, and \w butter|strong="H2529"\w*, and \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and \w cheese|strong="H8194"\w* of \w kine|strong="H1241"\w*, for \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him, to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: for they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add is\add* \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, and \w weary|strong="H5889"\w*, and \w thirsty|strong="H6771"\w*, in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.
